Objectifs du module: The course is designed to review the basic statistic concepts, improve statistical abilities of the students, and make the MBA courses more comprehensive. We will combine theoretical review with examples involving applications of statistics in business and practice exercises (using Microsoft Excel).
Programme du module: Outline 1. Presenting and Summarizing data: a. Frequency charts, histograms b. Summary measures: Mean, median, mode, variance, stdev, etc. 2. Random variables and Probability distributions: a. Binomial distribution b. Poisson distribution c. Normal distribution d. Correlation and covariance of two random variables
